There is a amino acid he can take that will help rebuild his natural endorphins which are the neurotransmitters that are responsible for pain relief, ITs called DLPA  he cannot take it though if he is taking any anti depressants, has diabetes, or high blood pressure. If he is free of all thoses things he can take it. it can even help with withdrawal symptoms
